main event: A small weather balloon was sighted in Indiana by 3 hunters and got entangled in power lines.
interesting points: The object was described as half plastic and half fiber., The hunters reported the sighting while they were out in the field., The balloon was later identified as a weather balloon used for measuring the earth's magnetic field., The weather balloon was likely carried to a high altitude before being transmitted back to a ground station., The case was evaluated and noted for further assessment.
